content: I think I'll definitely check out Ludovico Einaudi and Olafur Arnalds for calming music, and Rainy Mood for nature sounds. I've always found the sound of rain to be really soothing. By the way, do you have any recommendations for some good painting classes or tutorials online? I've been taking a painting class lately and I really enjoy it, but I was thinking of supplementing it with some online resources.
